text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS Fear mongering Trump. Fascist militia sent in as a political strategy as a last ditch effort to gain votes. Wow!!!  Such desperation for a Trump who’s out of control. He wants you to get detracted by crime which he incited so you don’t focus on the COVID-19 disaster.
